## Description {#details}

Provides implementations for PassManager and AnalysisManager template methods.

These classes should be explicitly instantiated for any IR unit, and files doing the explicit instantiation should include this header.

<SectionDefinition>

## Variables

<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current unit of IR. Therefore, the remaining analysis results in the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">llvm::StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a828ff8185f881fca9e3d534781244041">getCachedResult&lt;PassInstrumentationAnalysis&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PI-&gt;runAnalysesCleared(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResultsListI = AnalysisResultLists.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ResultsListI == AnalysisResultLists.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delete the map entries that point into the results list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;IDAndResult : ResultsListI-&gt;second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnalysisResults.erase(&#123;IDAndResult.first, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And actually destroy and erase the results associated with this IR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AnalysisResultLists.erase(ResultsListI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AnalysisResultMapT::iterator RI;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::tie(RI, Inserted) = AnalysisResults.insert(std::make&#95;pair(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::make&#95;pair(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AnalysisResultListT::iterator()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t have a cached result for this function, look up the pass and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// run it to produce a result, which we then add to the cache.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Inserted) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = this-&gt;lookUpPass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a> PI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> != <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysisinfomixin/#a605c4abf7c7f3a053bf869b79098cd68">PassInstrumentationAnalysis::ID</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PI = getResult&lt;PassInstrumentationAnalysis&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, ExtraArgs...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation/#a5a2cc6fe0017dd7067b103118a7bc914">runBeforeAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnalysisResultListT &amp;ResultList = AnalysisResultLists&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ResultList.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>.run(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, ExtraArgs...));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation/#adda8476ef0007c61013ba8e5c46c6693">runAfterAnalysis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// P.run may have inserted elements into AnalysisResults and invalidated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RI = AnalysisResults.find(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RI != AnalysisResults.end() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;we just inserted it!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RI-&gt;second = std::prev(ResultList.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;RI-&gt;second-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IRUnitT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... ExtraArgTs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a64b2a209a16bcd41375b5cae12690eaa"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a64b2a209a16bcd41375b5cae12690eaa">AnalysisManager&lt;IRUnitT, ExtraArgTs...&gt;::invalidate</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    IRUnitT &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re done if all analyses on this IR unit are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a2de5aab2964e0b9266423d5f6c375051">allAnalysesInSetPreserved</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allanalyseson">AllAnalysesOn&lt;IRUnitT&gt;</a>&gt;())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Track whether each analysis&#39;s result is invalidated in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IsResultInvalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smalldensemap">SmallDenseMap&lt;AnalysisKey &#42;, bool, 8&gt;</a> IsResultInvalidated;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/invalidator">Invalidator</a> Inv(IsResultInvalidated, AnalysisResults);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AnalysisResultListT &amp;ResultsList = AnalysisResultLists&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;AnalysisResultPair : ResultsList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is basically the same thing as Invalidator::invalidate, but we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can&#39;t call it here because we&#39;re operating on the type-erased result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Moreover if we instead called invalidate() directly, it would do an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unnecessary look up in ResultsList.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = AnalysisResultPair.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Result = &#42;AnalysisResultPair.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IMapI = IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IMapI != IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This result was already handled via the Invalidator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to invalidate the result, giving it the Invalidator so it can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursively query for any dependencies it has and record the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that we cannot reuse &#39;IMapI&#39; here or pre-insert the ID, as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Result.invalidate may insert things into the map, invalidating our</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iterator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inserted =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">        IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#adb33f3ede2f5bfc9b3ee658aaf648492">insert</a>(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, Result.invalidate(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>, PA, Inv)&#125;).second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    (void)Inserted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Inserted &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should never have already inserted this ID, likely &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;indicates a cycle!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now erase the results that were marked above as invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a49c487a9395a6c384be8544cfb2cfccf">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ResultsList.begin(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = ResultsList.end(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>;) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsResultInvalidated.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0b2ca98dc28c61793ff5c90d23e5f14e">lookup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#a828ff8185f881fca9e3d534781244041">getCachedResult&lt;PassInstrumentationAnalysis&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation/#a698253acb40299131fecdb9489f88fcd">runAnalysisInvalidated</a>(this-&gt;lookUpPass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = ResultsList.erase(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AnalysisResults.erase(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/legalizer-cpp/#a05ab4853f7153e537774d02580e761ec">IR</a>&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
